title: Let's look at land
creator_credit: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Rodney Musch
brief_description: An information film designed to attract service industries to Tasmania. It deals with various industrial planning zones throughout the State mentioning the attendant advantages of establishing light industries in these zones.
creator_credit_for_label: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Rodney Musch
